name: Evade: birds in the sky
description:
Evade: Birds In The Sky Is a Endless Runner Game Where You have To Evade Many Birds As You Can & Go As Far As You Can.

There Are 4 Different Mode Those Are: Easy, Normal, Hard, 2Players

.

.

.

This Is The First Game I Made, I Got The Idea From A Game That I Used To Play As A Kid

*The Game Still Has No Music, I'm Sorry For The Inconvenient, Hope I'll Make the Music That Fit The Game Soon
